Craig, Attorney at Law, for Former Senior U.S. Military Officials Alex T. Haskell, Attorney at Law, for Former Senior U.S. Military Officials Mr. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC Mr. Kenneth J. Rose, Durham, Attorney at Law, for Robinson, Marcus Reymond Mr. David Weiss, Attorney at Law, for Robinson, Marcus Reymond Mr. James E. Williams, Jr., Carrboro, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice Mr. James E. Coleman, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Becton, Charles, et al. Mr. Robert P. Mosteller, Attorney at Law, for Retired Members of the NC Judiciary Mr. Jonathan Babb, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC Mr. William R. West, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 21st of June 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of June 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 16th day of July 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
